definition: a convenient package or parcel (as of cigarettes or film), treat the body or any part of it by wrapping it, as with blankets or sheets, and applying compresses to it, or stuffing it to provide cover, containment, or therapy, or to absorb blood
details:
noun
- a convenient package or parcel (as of cigarettes or film)
- a bundle (especially one carried on the back)
- a sheet or blanket (either dry or wet) to wrap around the body for its therapeutic effect
- a cream that cleanses and tones the skin
= synonyms: face pack
- a complete collection of similar things
- a group of hunting animals
- an exclusive circle of people with a common purpose
= synonyms: camp
- an association of criminals
= synonyms: ring
- a large indefinite number
= synonyms: myriad
verb
- treat the body or any part of it by wrapping it, as with blankets or sheets, and applying compresses to it, or stuffing it to provide cover, containment, or therapy, or to absorb blood
= example: treat the body or any part of it by wrapping it, as with blankets or sheets, and applying compresses to it, or stuffing it to provide cover, containment, or therapy, or to absorb blood
- carry, as on one's back
- arrange in a container
= example: arrange in a container
- load with a pack
= synonyms: load down
- compress into a wad
= synonyms: compact
- have the property of being packable or of compacting easily
= synonyms: compact
- seal with packing
= example: seal with packing
- press down tightly
= synonyms: tamp, tamp down
- hike with a backpack
= example: hike with a backpack
= synonyms: backpack
- press tightly together or cram
= example: press tightly together or cram
= synonyms: jam
- fill to capacity
= example: fill to capacity
- set up a committee or legislative body with one's own supporters so as to influence the outcome
= example: set up a committee or legislative body with one's own supporters so as to influence the outcome
- have with oneself
= synonyms: carry
